name: Disc Golf Islands
description:
You've always wanted to play disc golf on picturesque desert islands, now you can! Disc Golf Islands is the first mobile disc golf game with realistic physics and stunning graphics!

Take to the course and sink putts on 18 beautiful holes or head to the range and see how long you can survive arcade mode. Choose your favourite course, select wind settings and tee position then challenge someone on-line or have a casual round off-line. No ads, no in app purchases, just fun.

** Try the demo for free first! **

Features:
- Skillful gameplay!
- Stunning 3D graphics!
- On-line turn based multiplayer!
- Infinite survival mode!
- Realistic physics! Wind, collisions and aerodynamics!
- Easy to pick-up, difficult to master!

Permissions:
- "Phone state and identity" this is needed so that the game can pause when you get an incoming call. Nothing personal about you is logged or even looked at.
- "Network access" is needed to pull the daily message from the Disc Golf Islands servers.

Search terms: disc golf, disc golf islands, multiplayer, multi-player, frisbee, frisbee golf, turn based, on-line disc golf, 3d disc golf, disc physics, disc golf physics.
